revised_title: The Accumulation of Helium in Geological Time: A Study of Zircon Minerals
tldr: The author conducted experiments to determine the age of rocks using the helium content in zircon minerals. They found that the ratio of helium to radioactive material in the minerals is closely related to the geological age of the rock. This method allowed them to set a minimum age for the rocks, providing valuable information about Earth's history.
